alert.note: Alert for Russell; Scott; Wise (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:15AM EST until February 18 at 8:53AM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia...Tennessee... Clinch River Near Speers Ferry VA affecting Scott and Hancock Counties. Clinch River At Cleveland VA affecting Wise, Russell and Scott Counties. Pigeon River At Newport TN affecting Cocke County. Sequatchie River Near Whitwell TN affecting Marion, Sequatchie and Bledsoe Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...Virginia... Clinch River Above Tazewell TN affecting Grainger, Claiborne and Hancock Counties. Emory River At Oakdale TN affecting Morgan and Roane Counties. Powell River Near Arthur TN affecting Union and Claiborne Counties. Powell River Near Jonesville VA affecting Lee and Hancock Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Clinch River at Cleveland VA. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding affects the pumping station for the water treatment plant. At 16.0 feet, Approximately 10 acres are flooded, including the ballpark. At 18.0 feet, Water begins to affect a few houses immediately along the river downstream from the ballpark, flooding approximately 25 acres. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 13.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 16.5 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EST /715 PM CST/.
